reviewText: This is a wonderfully entertaining DVD about otters.  They are amazing animals anyway. I actually viewed it on VHS many years ago and purchased it on DVD as a gift for our cousin, as he is such an otter lover!
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you love river otters, this will be a very enjoyable DVD. Very good filming of a family of otters through the year at a particular lake in the Yellowstone Park. The bonus material of background work by scientists on the scene is rather dry but informative but also suffers from technical glitches in playback. Shipping was quick & secure.fdipasq
Title: N/A

reviewText: I bought this DVD for a friend and she loved it--waatached it twice right away.  Though the film is only an hour long,this film was right for her.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I loved this story and bought two of them as gifts . One for myself. Beautiful story. Nice for young person especially
Title: N/A

reviewText: Gave this to my dad who always loved Otters for Christmas. It was part of a combo gift that included the adoption of a river otter from the world wildlife foundation that included a stuffed otter among other adoption stuff. Rounded out the gift nicely.The movie was informative and had lots of great wildlife video as well as good behind the seen stuff from Yellowstone.
Title: N/A
